goalForm.createSubtitle: Define your investment goal using the SMART framework.

step1.title: What's your goal?
step1.subtitle: Be specific about what you want to achieve. A clear goal is the first step to success.
step1.titlePlaceholder: e.g., House Down Payment, Emergency Fund, Dream Vacation
step1.titleError: Please enter a goal title (at least 3 characters)
step1.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe your goal in detail. What exactly do you want to achieve? The more specific, the better.
step1.descriptionError: Please be specific about your goal (at least 20 characters)
step1.smartTipText: Instead of "save money", try "Save $50,000 for a down payment on a 3-bedroom house in Austin". Specific goals are easier to plan and track.

step2.title: How much do you need?
step2.subtitle: Set a measurable target amount for your goal.
step2.amountError: Please enter a valid amount greater than 0
step2.smartTipText: A specific number helps you track progress and know exactly when you've achieved your goal.

step3.title: When do you want to achieve this?
step3.subtitle: Set a realistic deadline for your goal.
step3.smartTipText: A deadline creates urgency and helps you plan your savings strategy.

step4.title: Which bucket does this belong to?
step4.subtitle: Categorize your goal based on its priority and risk level.
step4.smartTipText: The 3 Buckets methodology helps you balance safety, growth, and dreams in your financial planning.

step5.title: Why does this matter to you?
step5.subtitle: Connect emotionally with your goal to stay motivated.
step5.whyPlaceholder: Describe why achieving this goal is important to you personally...
step5.whyError: Please explain why this goal matters (at least 10 characters)
step5.smartTipText: Goals connected to your values and emotions are more likely to be achieved. This statement will remind you why you started.
